Package com.payd.shooti.graphics.lighting

Interface ISimpleLight

All Superinterfaces:
IDispose, IUpdate
All Known Implementing Classes:
FlashlightLight, SimpleChainLight, SimpleConeLight, SimpleLight, SimpleLightGroup, SimplePointLight, SimpleSkyLight, WeaponMuzzleLight
public interface ISimpleLight extends IUpdate, IDispose

  • Method Details

    • turnOn

      void turnOn()
      Interpolated enablement.

    • turnOn

      void turnOn(float delay)
      Interpolated enablement with delay.
      Parameters:
      delay - The delay in milliseconds.

    • turnOff

      void turnOff()
      Interpolated disablement.

    • turnOff

      void turnOff(boolean dispose)
      Interpolated disablement with disposal once fully disabled.
      Parameters:
      dispose - Set to true to dispose the light it has a distance length of 0.

    • toggle

      void toggle()
      Interpolated toggle of the light.

    • attachToEntity

      void attachToEntity(BoundsEntity entity)
      Magnetizes position to an entity and follows it. Affects light direction as well.

    • setPoint

      void setPoint(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 targetPoint)
      Goes to a specific point.
      Parameters:
      targetPoint - The Vector2 to magnetize to.

    • setPoint

      void setPoint(float x, float y)
      Goes to a specific point.

    • enter

      void enter()
      Override this method to set the lights properties to a calm state. This method is called when the light is initialized and awaiting a turnOn() call.

    • isHiddenBasedOnProperties

      boolean isHiddenBasedOnProperties()
      Returns true if the light is hidden based on its internal properties being net-zero. (distance, cone degree, etc.)

    • setActive

      void setActive(boolean active)
      Hard enable/disable the light. Does not affect distance or alpha.

    • setStatic

      void setStatic(boolean isStatic)
      Sets the static state of the light.

    • setContactFilter

      void setContactFilter(short categoryBits, short groupIndex, short maskBits)

    • update

      void update(float delta)
      Performs frame-by-frame interpolation on the light properties relative to its isOn state.
      Specified by:
      update in interface IUpdate
